document_data.mainbody: ''caduceus''' was a symbol associated with healing,<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Last Stand at Dragon Falls|5}} consisting of a [[staff]] intertwined by two [[snake]]s,
document_data.Notable Caducei:
* ''[[Caduceus staff]]'', staves with a rather basic curative enchantment that could be found on [[Toril]].<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Potions, Lotions, & Notions: Closed!/Treasure|2}}
* ''Cadaceus'', a legendary staff belonging to the [[Olympian pantheon|Olympian]] god [[Hermes]], who received it as a gift from his sibling [[Apollo]]. Some described it as golden, while others said it was white.
document_data.Notable Users: * A caduceus was the holy symbol of Hermes.<ref><ref>
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, a coalition force was formed by [[Calaunt]], [[Impiltur]], [[Procampur]], [[Ravens Bluff]], and [[Tantras]] to fend against remnant forces of the [[Tuigan Horde]] in the [[the Vast]].<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Last Stand at Dragon Falls|3}} Among these forces was the Impiltur Defense Force, whose division each had a distinct [[sash]] and symbol. The IDF's [[cleric]]al division wore white sashes adorned with a caduceus.<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Last Stand at Dragon Falls|4-5}}
